data.expected_outcome: Create episodes/, evaluations/, skill_stats/ directories and implement feedback loop MVP
data.actual_outcome: System now has 347 episodes, 353 evaluations, 8 skill_stats artifacts. Eval metrics skill confirms pipeline works.
data.next_action: Continue using feedback loop for real work, not just smoke tests
data.notes: Validated via eval_metrics skill showing full pipeline operational. Most episodes are smoke-test but structure works.
